Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Launch the Orchestra Framework
Create four contexts : A, B, C, D in d:\tests\contexts
Exit the Orchestra Framework
Automatic context reloading of unreachable contexts at startup time
In the Windows Explorer, rename d:\tests\contexts\A to d:\tests\contexts\AA and d:\tests\contexts\C to d:\tests\contexts\CC
Launch the Orchestra Framework

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context view contains two contexts: B and D. The "Unreachable Contexts" viewcontains two entries: ("A", "d:\tests\contexts\A") and ("C", "d:\tests\contexts\C")

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Exit the Orchestra Framework
In the Windows Explorer, rename d:\tests\contexts\AA to d:\tests\contexts\A and d:\tests\contexts\CC to d:\tests\contexts\C
Launch the Orchestra Framework

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context view contains four contexts: A, B, C and D. The "Unreachable Contexts" view is empty.

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Reloading selected unreachable contexts
Exit the Orchestra Framework
In the Windows Explorer, rename d:\tests\contexts\A to d:\tests\contexts\AA and d:\tests\contexts\C to d:\tests\contexts\CC
Launch the Orchestra Framework

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context view contains two contexts: B and D. The "Unreachable Contexts" viewcontains two entries: ("A", "d:\tests\contexts\A") and ("C", "d:\tests\contexts\C")

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Windows Explorer, rename d:\tests\contexts\AA to d:\tests\contexts\A
In the "Unreachable Contexts" view, right click on context "A" and select "Reload context" in the contextual menu.

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context view contains three contexts: A, B and D. The context "A" has been removed from the "Unreachable Contexts" view.

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the "Unreachable Contexts" view, right click on context "C" and select "Reload context" in the contextual menu.

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An error dialog box is popped up. Click on the "Details" button. The following error message is displayed: "Context is still unreachable at location d:\tests\contexts\C".

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Reloading all unreachable contexts at once
Exit the Orchestra Framework
In the Windows Explorer, rename d:\tests\contexts\A to d:\tests\contexts\AA
Launch the Orchestra Framework

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context view contains two contexts: B and D. The "Unreachable Contexts" viewcontains two entries: ("A", "d:\tests\contexts\A") and ("C", "d:\tests\contexts\C")

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Windows Explorer, rename d:\tests\contexts\AA to d:\tests\contexts\A and d:\tests\contexts\CC to d:\tests\contexts\C
Right click in the "Unreachable Contexts" view and select "Reload alls contexts" in the contextual menu.

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context view contains four contexts: A, B,C and D. The "Unreachable Contexts" view is empty.

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Remove a context from unreachable contexts
Exit the Orchestra Framework
In the Windows Explorer, rename d:\tests\contexts\A to d:\tests\contexts\AA and d:\tests\contexts\C to d:\tests\contexts\CC
Launch the Orchestra Framework

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context view contains two contexts: B and D. The "Unreachable Contexts" viewcontains two entries: ("A", "d:\tests\contexts\A") and ("C", "d:\tests\contexts\C")

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the "Unreachable Contexts" view, right click on context "A" and select "Remove project" in the contextual menu.

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context "A" has been removed from the "Unreachable Contexts" view.

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Exit the Orchestra Framework
In the Windows Explorer, rename d:\tests\contexts\AA to d:\tests\contexts\A
Launch the Orchestra Framework

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context view contains two contexts: B and D. The "Unreachable Contexts" view contains one entry: ("C", "d:\tests\contexts\C")
